channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Federal judge sides with Trump in allowing immigration enforcement in houses of worship
item.description: A federal judge is siding with the Trump administration in allowing immigration agents to conduct enforcement operations at houses of worship despite a lawsuit filed by religious groups over the new policy.
